attributes.action: ensure that Canon 40 of Magna Carta is still in practice in the British Legal Systems
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This states: "To no one will we sell, to no one deny or delay right or justice." To me, this is as vailid as it was when first stated in 1215.  To often, the "little man" has been put off seeking justice by its very cost.
